titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for, and clarify the classification of, machines and components used in the manufacture of digital versatile discs (DVDs).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/1/2000--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to machines and components used in the manufacture of digital versatile discs (DVDs).Amends the U.S. Notes to chapter 84 of the Schedule to specify what items are included with respect to such machines and components.
